title: Doctor Bones
summaries: Doctor Bones is a zombie variant that rarely appears in the Jungle and Underground Jungle at night. It acts the same as normal zombies, slowly walking towards the player to deal contact damage, while attempting to navigate around obstacles and only being able to open doors during a Blood Moon. It has significantly greater health than all other zombies and deals slightly higher damage. It drops the Archaeologist's Hat when killed.
It does not have any variants, nor does it have an Armed variation in Expert Mode(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions).

It is one of the few entities that can be detected by the Lifeform Analyzer(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) or its upgrades. Doctor Bones requires 10 kills to be awarded completion of his Bestiary entry and corresponding banner, as opposed to the usual 50 kills.

statistics.Environment: Jungle Underground Jungle
statistics.Damage: 20/40/60
statistics.Max Life: 500/1000/1500
statistics.KB Resist: 50%/55%/60%
